mapper.select:
select sum(STU_COUNT_TIME) as value,'videocen' as type, '视频中心' as name from LAW_STU_RECORD where user_id=#{userId} and STU_FROM='videocen'
AND STU_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND STU_TIME <= TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
UNION ALL select sum(STU_COUNT_TIME) as value,'audiocen' as type, '音频中心' as name from LAW_STU_RECORD where user_id=#{userId} and STU_FROM='audiocen'
AND STU_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND STU_TIME <= TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
UNION ALL select sum(STU_COUNT_TIME) as value,'learntask' as type, '学习任务' as name from LAW_STU_RECORD where user_id=#{userId} and STU_FROM='learntask'
AND STU_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND STU_TIME <= TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
UNION ALL select sum(STU_COUNT_TIME) as value,'caseana' as type, '案例分析' as name from LAW_STU_RECORD where user_id=#{userId} and STU_FROM='caseana'
AND STU_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND STU_TIME <= TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select sum(STU_COUNT) as value,'law' as type, '法律法规' as name from LAW_STU_RECORD where user_id=#{userId} and STU_TYPE='law'
AND STU_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND STU_TIME <= TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
UNION ALL select sum(STU_COUNT) as value,'stu_video' as type, '视频' as name from LAW_STU_RECORD where user_id=#{userId} and STU_TYPE='stu_video'
AND STU_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND STU_TIME <= TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
UNION ALL select sum(STU_COUNT) as value,'stu_audio' as type, '音频' as name from LAW_STU_RECORD where user_id=#{userId} and STU_TYPE='stu_audio'
AND STU_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND STU_TIME <= TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
UNION ALL select sum(STU_COUNT) as value,'stu_pic' as type, '图文' as name from LAW_STU_RECORD where user_id=#{userId} and STU_TYPE='stu_pic'
AND STU_TIME >= TO_DATE(#{startTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')
AND STU_TIME <= TO_DATE(#{endTime}, 'yyyy-mm-dd')

select videoT.id as userId,videoT.FULL_NAME as userName,videoT.videoTime, AUDIOT.audioTime,taskT.taskTime,caseT.caseTime, videoN.videoNum,audioN.audioNum,picN.picNum,lawN.lawNum from
(SELECT U . ID, U .FULL_NAME, ls.value as videoTime
FROM LAW_USER U LEFT JOIN( select sum(STU_COUNT_TIME) as value,user_id from LAW_STU_RECORD where STU_FROM='videocen' GROUP BY user_id) ls on ls.user_id = u.id where u.ORG_ID=#{orgId}) videoT,
(SELECT U . ID, U .FULL_NAME, ls.value as audioTime
FROM LAW_USER U LEFT JOIN( select sum(STU_COUNT_TIME) as value,user_id
from LAW_STU_RECORD where STU_FROM='audiocen' GROUP BY user_id) ls on ls.user_id = u.id where u.ORG_ID=#{orgId}) audioT,
(SELECT U . ID, U .FULL_NAME, ls.value as taskTime
FROM LAW_USER U LEFT JOIN( select sum(STU_COUNT_TIME) as value,user_id
from LAW_STU_RECORD where STU_FROM='learntask' GROUP BY user_id) ls on ls.user_id = u.id where u.ORG_ID=#{orgId}) taskT,
(SELECT U . ID, U .FULL_NAME, ls.value as caseTime
FROM LAW_USER U LEFT JOIN( select sum(STU_COUNT_TIME) as value,user_id
from LAW_STU_RECORD where STU_FROM='caseana' GROUP BY user_id) ls on ls.user_id = u.id where u.ORG_ID=#{orgId}) caseT,
(SELECT U . ID, U .FULL_NAME, ls.value as videoNum
FROM LAW_USER U LEFT JOIN( select sum(STU_COUNT) as value,user_id from LAW_STU_RECORD where STU_TYPE='stu_video' GROUP BY user_id) ls on ls.user_id = u.id where u.ORG_ID=#{orgId}) videoN,
(SELECT U . ID, U .FULL_NAME, ls.value as audioNum
FROM LAW_USER U LEFT JOIN( select sum(STU_COUNT) as value,user_id
from LAW_STU_RECORD where STU_TYPE='stu_audio' GROUP BY user_id) ls on ls.user_id = u.id where u.ORG_ID=#{orgId}) audioN,
(SELECT U . ID, U .FULL_NAME, ls.value as picNum
FROM LAW_USER U LEFT JOIN( select sum(STU_COUNT) as value,user_id
from LAW_STU_RECORD where STU_TYPE='stu_pic' GROUP BY user_id) ls on ls.user_id = u.id where u.ORG_ID=#{orgId}) picN,
(SELECT U . ID, U .FULL_NAME, ls.value as lawNum
FROM LAW_USER U LEFT JOIN( select sum(STU_COUNT) as value,user_id
from LAW_STU_RECORD where STU_TYPE='law' GROUP BY user_id) ls on ls.user_id = u.id where u.ORG_ID=#{orgId}) lawN
where VIDEOT.id= AUDIOT.id and VIDEOT.id= taskT.id and VIDEOT.id= caseT.id and VIDEOT.id= videoN.id and VIDEOT.id= audioN.id and VIDEOT.id= picN.id and VIDEOT.id= lawN.id
select count(1) from LAW_USER where ORG_ID=#{orgId}
